theshadowreaper:ReapingSlash.NAME: Reaping Slash
theshadowreaper:ReapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !D! theshadowreaper:Reap to ALL enemies.

theshadowreaper:BladeSpin.NAME: Blade Spin
theshadowreaper:BladeSpin.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theshadowreaper:MarkForDeath.NAME: Mark For Death
theshadowreaper:MarkForDeath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theshadowreaper:Reap . NL Next turn, gain [E] .

theshadowreaper:DemonArmor.NAME: Demon Armor
theshadowreaper:DemonArmor.DESCRIPTION: When you end your turn with unused [E] , gain !M! Block per unused [E] .

theshadowreaper:PrepareTheKill.NAME: Prepare The Kill
theshadowreaper:PrepareTheKill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn lose !M! Strength.

theshadowreaper:Distract.NAME: Distract
theshadowreaper:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

theshadowreaper:Gank.NAME: Gank
theshadowreaper:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, deal !D! damage again.

theshadowreaper:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
theshadowreaper:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Choose a card in your draw pile and give it Retain. NL Exhaust.

theshadowreaper:UmbralTrespass.NAME: Umbral Trespass
theshadowreaper:UmbralTrespass.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Next turn, deal !theshadowreaper:m2! damage. Exhaust{!Upgrades!|>0=ive !stslib:ex!}.

theshadowreaper:StrategicManeuver.NAME: Strategic Maneuver
theshadowreaper:StrategicManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Select 5 cards from your draw pile and place them at the top of the draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theshadowreaper:GoldAdvantage.NAME: Gold Advantage
theshadowreaper:GoldAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs less than it's original price, gain !M! Block.

theshadowreaper:MoltenBlood.NAME: Molten Blood
theshadowreaper:MoltenBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 HP. Deal !D! damage. Target loses !M! HP.

theshadowreaper:HeavyHitter.NAME: Heavy Hitter
theshadowreaper:HeavyHitter.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card that costs 2 or more each turn gain [E] .
theshadowreaper:HeavyHitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card that costs 2 or more each turn gain [E] [E] .

theshadowreaper:UmbralEnergy.NAME: Umbral Energy
theshadowreaper:UmbralEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] .

theshadowreaper:BladesReach.NAME: Blade's Reach
theshadowreaper:BladesReach.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the two frontmost enemies. NL [#38d3f3]Assassin:[] Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL [#9b111e]Rhaast:[] Gain !M! Block

theshadowreaper:FinishingTouches.NAME: Finishing Touches
theshadowreaper:FinishingTouches.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain [E]  for each attack you've played this turn up to a maximum of !M!  [E] .

theshadowreaper:SecondStrike.NAME: Second Strike
theshadowreaper:SecondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you played a card costing more than 1 this turn.

theshadowreaper:SlaughterTheWeak.NAME: Slaughter The Weak
theshadowreaper:SlaughterTheWeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the enemy has less than 50% HP, deal double damage to that enemy.

theshadowreaper:BloodGambit.NAME: Blood Gambit
theshadowreaper:BloodGambit.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain [E] and draw a card.

theshadowreaper:Cull.NAME: Cull
theshadowreaper:Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL theshadowreaper:Reaper's Touch.

theshadowreaper:EdgeOfDeath.NAME: Edge Of Death
theshadowreaper:EdgeOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Reap. NL Deal damage equal to half the target's reap.

theshadowreaper:ShadowClone.NAME: Shadow Clone
theshadowreaper:ShadowClone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand, Add a copy that costs 0 into your hand. Exhaust.

theshadowreaper:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
theshadowreaper:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this dealt at least !M! damage, gain !B! Block.

theshadowreaper:ShadowSight.NAME: Shadow Sight
theshadowreaper:ShadowSight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] . NL You can only play 1 Shadow Sight per turn.

theshadowreaper:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
theshadowreaper:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal 8 damage. NL If you played a card costing 2 or more this turn, gain 8 Block.

theshadowreaper:CalculatedSteps.NAME: Calculated Steps
theshadowreaper:CalculatedSteps.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1.

theshadowreaper:CalculatedStrikes.NAME: Calculated Strikes
theshadowreaper:CalculatedStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1.

theshadowreaper:Brutalize.NAME: Brutalize
theshadowreaper:Brutalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target does not have Vulnerable, apply !M! Vulnerable.

theshadowreaper:ShadowAmbush.NAME: Shadow Ambush
theshadowreaper:ShadowAmbush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has a debuff, deal an additional !M! damage.

theshadowreaper:DarkinRage.NAME: Darkin Rage
theshadowreaper:DarkinRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain !M! Strength.

theshadowreaper:WhispersOfBlood.NAME: Whispers Of Blood
theshadowreaper:WhispersOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! theshadowreaper:Reap to ALL enemies.

theshadowreaper:Stalk.NAME: Stalk
theshadowreaper:Stalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.
